Message From Our  
Interim President and CEO About 
ACI Worldwide2021  
Highlights  Sustainability at  
ACI WorldwideSustaining  
the Planet Sustaining Our People 
and Communities Sustaining   
Our BusinessMoving  
ForwardAppendices43
Paola Barrios, senior manager of operations, is pursuing her Master of Business 
Administration with a concentration in International Management at Bellevue 
University. Paola joined ACI in 2012 and is based in Bogotá, Colombia. She 
decided to take advantage of ACI’s tuition assistance to further develop her 
business knowledge and skills. 
“I have had a wonderful experience attending classes at Bellevue University,” 
Paola said. “I can attend classes at a U.S. university online, which allows me to 
balance my time between work and family. I am happy to have ACI’s support as 
I pursue my master’s degree; and I feel proud to work here.”Growth Through Education
